options.description: Address to listen for peer connections.
options.name: address

options.description: Port to listen for peer connections.
options.name: port

options.description:
Port to listen for Tor peer connections.
If set, inbound connections to this port are tagged as onion peers.
options.name: onionPort

options.description:
Listen for peer connections at `address:port`
and `address:onionPort` (if {option}`onionPort` is set).
options.name: listen

options.description:
Listen for peer connections at `address:whitelistedPort`.
Peers connected through this socket are automatically whitelisted.
options.name: listenWhitelisted

options.description: See `listenWhitelisted`.
options.name: whitelistedPort

options.description:
Bash expression which outputs the public service address to announce to peers.
If left empty, no address is announced.
options.name: getPublicAddressCmd

options.description: The package providing bitcoin binaries.
options.name: package

options.description: Extra lines appended to {file}`bitcoin.conf`.
options.name: extraConfig

options.description: The data directory for bitcoind.
options.name: dataDir

options.description: Address to listen for JSON-RPC connections.
options.name: address

options.description: Port to listen for JSON-RPC connections.
options.name: port

options.description: The number of threads to service RPC calls.
options.name: threads

options.description: Allow JSON-RPC connections from specified sources.
options.name: allowip

options.description: Allowed users for JSON-RPC connections.
options.name: users

options.description: Enable regtest mode.
options.name: regtest

options.description: Connect through SOCKS5 proxy
options.name: proxy

options.description:
Enable peer connections via i2p.
With `only-outgoing`, incoming i2p connections are disabled.
options.name: i2p

options.description:
If enabled, data dir content is readable by the bitcoind service group.
Warning: This disables bitcoind's wallet support.
options.name: dataDirReadableByGroup

options.description:
Create new files with system default permissions, instead of umask 077
(only effective with disabled wallet functionality)
options.name: sysperms

options.description: Do not load the wallet and disable wallet RPC calls
options.name: disablewallet

options.description: Override the default database cache size in MiB.
options.name: dbCache

options.description:
Automatically prune block files to stay under the specified target size in MiB.
Value 0 disables pruning.
options.name: prune

options.description: Enable the transaction index.
options.name: txindex

options.description: ZMQ address for zmqpubrawblock notifications
options.name: zmqpubrawblock

options.description: ZMQ address for zmqpubrawtx notifications
options.name: zmqpubrawtx

options.description:
If this block is in the chain assume that it and its ancestors are
valid and potentially skip their script verification.
options.name: assumevalid

options.description: Add nodes to connect to and attempt to keep the connections open
options.name: addnodes

options.description: Discover own IP addresses
options.name: discover

options.description: The type of addresses to use
options.name: addresstype

options.description: The user as which to run bitcoind.
options.name: user

options.description: The group as which to run bitcoind.
options.name: group

options.description: Binary to connect with the bitcoind instance.
options.name: cli
